messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an automatic failure in a Fumble result?
A Fumble result of 96–100 (if the number required to pass a roll is below 50), or 100 (if the number required to pass a roll is 50 or above)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does a Half represent in the game?
One half of the skill or characteristic on 1D100
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is typically handed to the players by the Keeper?
Documents or otherwise that the Keeper physically hands to the players
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a Hand-to-Hand combat style in the game?
A fighting mode or a weapon attack powered by muscle, such as a punch or sword swing
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is considered an Extreme Success in the game?
A result equal to or below one-fifth of the skill or characteristic value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the definition of Extreme Success?
An Extreme success is a result equal to or below one-fifth of the skill or characteristic value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the definition of Hard Success?
A Hard success is a result equal to or below one-half of the skill or characteristic value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do characters recover from injuries?
If an injured character has not sustained a major wound, the character recovers 1 hit point per day; otherwise a roll must be made
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the formula for calculating a character's Hit Points (HP)?
The total of a character’s CON and SIZ characteristics divided by ten (rounded down)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the total number of hit points a character has when in full health called?
The hit point total
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if an injured character recovers from a minor injury?
The character recovers 1 hit point per day.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the character's hit points total calculated?
The total of a character’s CON and SIZ characteristics divided by ten (rounded down).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what circumstances cannot a player roll to affect an opponent?
If the opposing character's characteristic exceeds that of the investigator by 100 or more.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if players are unsure of what to do?
They may make an Idea roll and the Keeper will put them back on track.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of a 'Major Wound' on an injured character?
A roll must be made—see Major Wound.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition called when an investigator loses one-fifth or more of their current Sanity points in one game day?
Insanity, Indefinite
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to an investigator when their current Sanity points reach zero?
The investigator is completely insane (perhaps permanently institutionalized) and is removed from play
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition called when an investigator loses 5 or more Sanity points because of a single Sanity roll?
Insanity, Temporary
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a successful Idea roll affect an investigator who has suffered emotional trauma?
The investigator fully comprehends what has been seen and goes insane for 1D10 hours
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the amount used for Extreme difficulty level, such as one-fifth of a character's skill or characteristic on 1D100?
One-fifth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a Hazard in the context of the text?
A location in a chase that is likely to cause damage or delay
